DESCRIPTION:

Halo: Spartan Assault is a vertical shooter , events which occur between the "Halo 3" and "Halo 4 ." Develop career , participate in more than 30 campaigns , use your favorite weapons, vehicles and armor capabilities of the universe Halo. Unite on Xbox Live with friends and fight against hordes of mutants Flood in an entirely new cooperative mode online . Earn achievements , weekly pass assault operations , and fight for the first places on the leaderboard .
